Thank you. This is helpful. I still can't find a way to get the game to load. I do see a loading screen now but it won't load the game.
I am copying the link from the button taken off of the creator page here. It appears to work when I load it from my own browser directly from this site. But when I try to load the game from my site, it just shows a loading page.

Thank you. This is helpful. I still can't find a way to get the game to load. I do see a loading screen now but it won't load the game.

Posts.EditableText:
You mean a link that looks like `//textadventures.co.uk/games/view/######################/name-of-game`, or a link that looks like `//textadventures.co.uk/games/play/######################`?

Either should work, although if you're using the latter you should probably give the option of a second URI with `play` changed to `resume`, for the benefit of anyone who has a saved game.

Can you show an example page that you have this problem on?
